structure.unit: REPEAL OR VACATION OF CHARTERS -- USURPATION

law.catch_line: Style of action to repeal charter -- Prosecution.
law.text: The action to repeal or vacate a charter shall be in the name of the Commonwealth, and be brought and prosecuted by the Attorney General, or under his sanction and direction by an attorney for the Commonwealth.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 481.
